definitions.definition: To extol or honour in a solemn manner.
definitions.example: to celebrate the name of the Most High

definitions.definition: To honour by rites, by ceremonies of joy and respect, or by refraining from ordinary business; to observe duly.
To engage in joyful activity in appreciation of an event.
definitions.example: I was promoted today at work—let’s celebrate!

definitions.definition: To perform or participate in, as a sacrament or solemn rite; to perform with appropriate rites.

definitions.example: She became a celebrated actress, but never won any major awards.
